title: ‘Co-Conspirators and Playmates From the Get-Go’
description: Jennifer Douglas was “avowedly anti-marriage” after her divorce; Kent Shell, too. Until she got down on one knee.
dc:creator: John Otis
media:credit: Paul Barbera for The New York Times
media:description: Jennifer Douglas and Kent Shell’s wedding, on Sept. 10 in Tivoli, N.Y., “wasn’t just about us, but it was about community and sort of consecrating ourselves to living out loud again,” Mr. Shell said.
